title: Netflix Q1 Results Show Growth from Price Hikes and Ad Tiers
summary: Netflix reported strong first quarter results, driven by successful price increases and growing adoption of its ad-supported subscription tiers, leading to gains in the company's stock price.
content:
Netflix demonstrated solid performance in Q1 2024, with financial results exceeding market expectations. The streaming giant's strategic decision to raise subscription prices while expanding its ad-supported viewing options has paid off.

The company's revenue growth was bolstered by successful implementation of price increases across several markets, while maintaining subscriber retention. The ad-supported tier has seen increasing adoption rates, providing an additional revenue stream.

Investors responded positively to the results, with Netflix shares trading higher following the announcement.
